#summary The onchange event fires when the contents of a form element change.
#labels about-dom,is-dom-event,from-w3c

== Usage ==

== Event targets ==

The `onchange` event fires on these elements:

  * [InputTypeTextElement <input type="text">]
  * [SelectElement <select>]
  * [TextareaElement <textarea>]

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||
